reuters.title: LYPHOMED <LMED> TO MARKET ANTIBIOTIC
reuters.body: LyphoMed Inc said the Food and Drug Administration gave it approval to market Vancomycin HCL, an antibiotic used in hospitals to treat life-threatening infections. It said the product is currently marketed by Eli Lilly and Co <LLY> under the trade name Vancocin. Sales in 1986 were 110 mln dlrs. LyphoMed said its objective is to get a 15 to 20 pct share of the market. Reuter 
